item.title: [Ubuntu] 架設 OpenVpn Server & Client
item.description: OpenVpn apt-get update apt-get install openvpn easy-rsa gunzip -c /usr/share/doc/openvpn/examples/sample-config-files/server.conf.gz > /etc/openvpn/server.conf vim /etc/openvpn/server.conf # dh dh1024.pem dh2048.pem ca ca.crt cert server.crt key server.key # 拿掉註解 push "redirect-gateway def1 bypass-dhcp" user nobody group nogroup # 補上8.8.8.8 push "dhcp-option DNS 8.8.8.8" ;push "dhcp-option DNS 208.67.222.222" ;push "dhcp-option DNS 208.67.220.220" #其他基本上維持預設即可 Packet Forwarding echo 1 > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward vim /etc/sysctl.conf # 拿掉註解 net.ipv4.ip_forward=1 Uncomplicated Firewall ufw allow ssh ufw allow 1194/udp ufw allow 80 # 開外連進來所需要的port vim /etc/default/ufw # 將DROP改成ACCEPT DEFAULT_FORWARD_POLICY="ACCEPT" vim /etc/ufw/before.
